item.title: District SP Conducts Midnight Surprise Inspections to Enhance Policing in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Jogulamba Gadwal District SP, T. Srinivasa Rao, IPS, conducted a surprise inspection of the night patrolling, Blue Colts, and beat duties being carried out by police personnel in Gadwal town during midnight hours.
As part of the inspection, the SP visited key areas, including Rajiv Chowk, Gandhi Chowk, Krishna Veni Chowk, Beerelli Road, Railway Station, and the New Housing Board locality. He observed the personnel on duty and assessed how they were executing their patrolling and beat re...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
